mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fish_zone_comment(fish_zone_comment_id, fish_man_id, fish_zone_comment_content, fish_zone_id, fish_zone_comment_parent, create_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{commentId}, #{wechat}, #{comment}, #{fishPond.fishPondId}, #{parentId}, #{createAt}, 0);
mapper.select:

AND fzc.fish_zone_comment_id = #{commentId}
